title: National Academies: We can’t define “race,” so stop using it in science

title: FCC officials owned stock in Comcast, Charter, AT&T, and Verizon, watchdog says
description: US law prohibits FCC employees from owning stock in firms regulated by the agency.

title: Do solar farms lower property values? A new study has some answers

title: All the ways the most common bit of climate misinformation is wrong
description: We've looked at natural cycles and causes. None of them can produce this warming.
